Attribute.Name: WRIN Suffix Attributes for Packaging
Attribute.ValueTemplate: <derive expr="IF(value('ProductGroup')="Paper & Packaging", concatenate( value('ConvertTradeItemWeight'), IF(PRODUNIT('ConvertTradeItemWeight')="kg"," kg",""),IF(PRODUNIT('ConvertTradeItemWeight')="lb"," lb",""), IF(PRODUNIT('ConvertTradeItemWeight')="g"," g",""),IF(PRODUNIT('ConvertTradeItemWeight')="oz"," oz",""), ';', value('TradeItemFormula'), ';', value('TradeItemLanguage'), ';', value('HandlingInstructionCode'), ';', value('CaseLanguage'), ';', value('TotalPackQty'), ';', value('PackQty'), ';', value('PackCount'), ';', value('PackagingType'), ';', value('TradeItemGraphics') ),"" )"/>

MetaData.Value: It is used to calculate Suffix attributes for Packaging.
